**Update** almost 3 months installed(updates turned off) Still valid.. Gotta love it!! 
@ goldenkne  -  Read directions, you must save the crack to the Root of the C drive.. Example.. C:\Crack  -  Not the desktop. And the windows 7 will keep automaticly extending the serial number every 30 days not activating it, but just as good..

**Update** almost 3 months installed(updates turned off) Still valid.. Gotta love it!!

**Update** In the directions for the crack, I found that after you install the crack and after it restarts the computer, DO NOT do as it says in the directions and enter in the C:IR5 in the command prompt. I just closed out of it and let it restart again. Doing it the way that directions says can cause it to say "This copy of windows is not Genuine" and can disable some features. This is due to the crack messing with registry. not a big deal, just thought I would let everyone know what I have found out.
